mapper.sql: SELECT MEMBER_ID, GAME_NUM, EASY, NORMAL, HARD FROM GAMESCORE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAMESCORE VALUES (#{ id }, #{ gameNum }, #{ easy }, #{ normal }, #{ hard })
mapper.update: UPDATE GAMESCORE SET GAME_NUM = #{ gameNum }, EASY = #{ easy }, NORMAL = #{ normal }, HARD = #{ hard } WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ id }
mapper.select: WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ id } AND GAME_NUM = #{ gameNum }
